name: Dig Inc
description:
You are in charge of a start-up mining company.  Educate and supply your team of miners with equipment in order to expand and increase productivity.

The crediters are on your back, demanding an ever increasing stream of cheap diamonds. You begin in small scale, and work your way towards self governance. To be able to grow your business you will constantly need to sell off some of your hard earned diamonds for gold, a kind of balancing act between growth and resource hoarding.

Will your workers find an unexpected treassure, or get hurt in a tragic mine collaps?
